name: .BARS
summary: Learn about .BARS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use BARS to BWAV (multiplatform) to extract BWAV files from Nintendo Switch BARS files. For example, you can use BARS to BWAV to extract BWAV files from Animal Crossing: New Horizons' BARS files. You can also use VGMToolbox (Windows) to extract audio from newer BARS files and SARCTools (Windows) to extract audio from older BARS files.
